mapper.select: select * from tb_location lo inner join tb_branch br on lo.location_no = br.location_no inner join tb_days da on br.branch_no = da.branch_no inner join tb_theater th on th.showing_no = da.showing_no inner join tb_film fi on th.film_seq = fi.film_seq inner join tb_times ti on ti.theater_no = fi.theater_no where da.showing_days = '04/20' and th.film_name = '어벤저스';
